clue: Always walking around the castle grounds and somehow knows everyone's age.
note: Talk to Hans walking around Lumbridge Castle.

clue:
[[Clue scroll (beginner) - Buried beneath the ground|Buried beneath the ground, who knows where it's found.

Lucky for you, A man called Reldo may have a clue.]]
note:
Speak to Reldo to receive a strange device used by Hot and Cold clues to locate the location of the next clue.
Players can immediately start the search without speaking to Reldo if they already own a strange device.

clue: In the place Duke Horacio calls home, talk to a man with a hat dropped by goblins.
note: Talk to the Cook in Lumbridge Castle.
image: Cryptic clue - talk to Lumbridge Cook.png

clue: In a village of barbarians, I am the one who guards the village from up high.
note: Talk to Hunding atop the tower on the east side of Barbarian Village.
image: Cryptic clue - talk hunding barbarian village.png

clue: Talk to Charlie the Tramp in Varrock.
note: Talk to Charlie the Tramp by the southern entrance to Varrock. He will give you a task.
image: Cryptic clue - talk to charlie the tramp.png

clue: Near the open desert I reside, to get past me you must abide. Go forward if you dare, for when you pass me, you'll be sweating by your hair.
note: Talk to Shantay at the Shantay Pass south of Al Kharid.
image: Cryptic clue - talk shantay shantay pass.png

clue: A crate found in the tower of a church is your next location.
note: Climb the ladder and search the crates on the in the church in East Ardougne.
image: Cryptic clue - search crate Ardougne church.png

clue: Belladonna, my dear. If only I had gloves, then I could hold you at last.
note: Talk to the Tool leprechaun at the Belladonna farming patch at Draynor Manor.

clue: Dig between some ominous stones in Falador.
note: Three standing stones inside a walled area. East of Falador's northern gate.
image: Cryptic clue - dig ominous stones falador.png

clue: Dig by the Giant's Den entrance, looking out over Lake Molch.
note: Southeast of Lake Molch. Just south of the Shayzien rowboat, outside the dungeon entrance.
image: Cryptic clue - Dig by the Giant's Den.png

clue: Dig in the centre of a great kingdom of 5 cities.
note: Dig in front of the large statue in the centre of Great Kourend.
image: Cryptic clue - dig centre Kourend statue.png

clue: Dig near some giant mushrooms, behind the Grand Tree.
note: Dig near the red mushrooms northwest of the Grand Tree's doors.

clue: Dig under Ithoi's cabin.
note: Dig under Ithoi the Navigator's cabin. Players who have not started The Corsair Curse quest may reach the location using a Charter Ship, via the Agility shortcut to the north (requires ), or by Spirit Tree to Feldip Hills and running east.

clue: Dig where only the skilled, the wealthy, or the brave can choose not to visit again.
note: Dig at the Lumbridge spawn (teleport area).

clue:
[[Cecilia|I'd like to hear some music. Come and see me on the bridge in Falador Park, and play:  

Thanks, Cecilia]]
note: Speak to Cecilia on the bridge in Falador Park.

clue: I wonder how many bronze swords he has handed out.
note: Talk to Vannaka in Edgeville Dungeon.

clue: I would make a chemistry joke, but I'm afraid I wouldn't get a reaction.
note: Talk to the Chemist west of Rimmington's house portal.

clue: I wouldn't wear this jean on my legs.
note: Talk to Father Jean in the Hosidius church.

clue: Look in the ground floor crates of houses in Falador.
note: The house east of Falador east bank.
image: Cryptic clue - The house east of the east bank.png

clue: Monk's residence in the far west. See robe storage device.
note: Search the drawers in the south tent of the monk's camp found west of the Hosidius mine.
image: Cryptic clue - see robe storage device.png

clue: One of the sailors in Port Sarim is your next destination.
note: Speak to Captain Tobias on the docks of Port Sarim.
image: Cryptic clue - talk captain tobias port sarim.png

clue: Salty peter.
note: Talk to Konoo who is digging saltpetre in Hosidius, east of the Woodcutting Guild.

clue: Search a bookcase in Lumbridge swamp.
note: Located in Father Urhney's house.
image: Cryptic clue - search bookcase lumbridge swamp.png

clue: Search a bookcase in the Wizards tower.
note: The bookcase located on the.
image: Cryptic clue - search bookcase wizards tower.png

clue: Search a wardrobe in Draynor.
note: Search the north wardrobe in Aggie's house.

clue: Search the chest in Fred the Farmer's bedroom.
note: Search the chest by Fred the Farmer's bed in his house northwest of Lumbridge
image: Cryptic clue - search chest fred the farmer.png

clue: Search chests found in the upstairs of shops in Port Sarim.
note: Search the east chest on the 2nd floor of Wydin's Food Store.
image: Cryptic clue - search chest wydin upstairs.png

clue: Search for a crate in a building in Hemenster.
note: House north of the Fishing Contest quest area, west of Grandpa Jack.

clue: Search for a crate in Varrock Castle.
list: Found in the Varrock Palace kitchen.
note: Search the crate in the corner of the kitchen in Varrock Castle.
image: Cryptic clue - search crate varrock palace.png

clue: Search for a crate on the ground floor of a house in Seers' Village.
note: Search the crate in Phantuwti Fanstuwi Farsight's house, south of the pub in Seers' Village.
image: Cryptic clue - search crate phantuwti seers.png

clue: Search the bookcase in the monastery.
note: Search the southeastern bookcase at Edgeville Monastery.

clue: Search the food barrel at the top of the Hunter Guild.
note: Search the filled food barrel at the top of the tree within the Hunter Guild, accessed from climbing the rope inside.
image: Cryptic clue - search Hunter Guild food barrel.png

clue: Search the eastern bookcase in Father Urhney's house.
note: Father Urhney's house is on the west side of Lumbridge Swamp.

clue: Search the boxes in a shop in Taverley.
note: Search the box in Gaius' Two Handed Shop, south of Taverley's house portal.

clue: Search the boxes in one of the tents in Al Kharid.
note: Search the crates in the tent east of the Silk trader.
image: Cryptic clue - search boxes tents al kharid.png

clue: Search the boxes in the goblin house near Lumbridge.
note: Goblin house on the eastern side of the river.
image: Cryptic clue - search boxes goblin house lumbridge.png

clue: Search the boxes in the house near the south entrance to Varrock.
note: The first house on the left when entering the city from the southern entrance.
image: Cryptic clue - search boxes south entrance varrock.png

clue: Search the boxes just outside the Armour shop in East Ardougne.
note: Outside Zenesha's Plate Mail Body Shop.
image: Cryptic clue - search boxes east ardougne armour shop.png

clue: Search the boxes of Falador's general store.
note: Falador General Store
image: Cryptic clue - search boxes falador general store.png

clue: Search the boxes next to a chest that needs a crystal key.
note: Crystal chest
image: Cryptic clue - search boxes near crystal chest.png

clue: Search the bucket in the Port Sarim jail.
note: Talk to Shantay at the Shantay Pass, ask what this place is, and identify yourself as an outlaw. After you're jailed, refuse to pay the 5gp fine twice and you'll be sent to the Port Sarim Jail.
image: Cryptic clue - search bucket port sarim jail.png

clue: Search the bush at the digsite centre.
note: The bush is on the east side of the west pathway towards the Digsite from the Exam Centre.
image: Cryptic clue - search bush digsite centre.png

clue: Search the chest in Barbarian Village.
note: The chest located in the house with a [[File:Spinning wheel icon.png]].
image: Cryptic clue - search chest barbarian village.png

clue: Search the chest in the Duke of Lumbridge's bedroom.
note: The Duke's room is on the in Lumbridge Castle.
image: Cryptic clue - search chest lumbridge duke.png

clue: Search the chest in the left-hand tower of Camelot Castle.
note: Located on the of the western tower of Camelot.
image: Cryptic clue - search chest left tower camelot.png

clue: Search the chests in the Dwarven Mine.
note: The chest is on the western wall, where Hura's Crossbow Shop is, in the Dwarven Mine.
image: Cryptic clue - search chests dwarven mine.png

clue: Search the chests upstairs in Al Kharid Palace.
note: The chest is located in the north-east corner on the.
image: Cryptic clue - search chests al kharid palace.png

clue: Search the Coffin in Edgeville.
note: Search the coffin located by the Wilderness teleport lever.

clue: Search the crate in the left-hand tower of Lumbridge Castle.
note: Located on the of the southern tower at the Lumbridge Castle entrance.
image: Cryptic clue - search crate left tower lumbridge.png

clue: Search the crate in the Toad and Chicken pub.
note: The Toad and Chicken pub is located in Burthorpe.
image: Cryptic clue - search crate toad chicken pub.png

clue: Search the crate near a cart in Port Khazard.
note: Search by the southern Khazard General Store in Port Khazard.
image: Cryptic clue - search crate port khazard.png

clue: Search the crates in a bank in Varrock.
note: Search in the basement of the West Varrock bank.
image: Cryptic clue - search crates west varrock bank.png

clue: Search the crates in a house in Yanille that has a piano.
note: The house is located north-west of the bank.
image: Cryptic clue - search crates piano yanille.png

clue: Search the crates in Canifis.
note: Search inside the shop, Rufus' Meat Emporium.

clue: Search the crates in Draynor Manor.
note: Top floor of the manor.
image: Cryptic clue - search crates draynor manor.png

clue: Search the crates in East Ardougne's general store.
note: Located south of the Ardougne church.
image: Cryptic clue - search crates east ardougne general.png

clue: Search the crates in Falador General store.
note: The Falador General Store can be found by the northern entrance to the city.
image: Cryptic clue - search crates falador general store.png

clue: Search the crates in Horvik's armoury.
note: Horvik's in Varrock.

clue: Search the crates in the Barbarian Village helmet shop.
note: Peksa's Helmet Shop in Barbarian Village.
image: Cryptic clue - search crates barbarian village.png

clue: Search the crates in the Dwarven mine.
note: Search the east of the Ice Mountain ladder entrance in the Drogo's Mining Emporium.
image: Cryptic clue - search crates dwarven mine.png

clue: Search the crates in the fruit store just east of the Hosidius town centre.
note: Search the crates in house containing fruit stalls.
image: Cryptic clue - search crate fruit store.png

clue: Search the crates in the guard house of the northern gate of East Ardougne.
note: The guard house is north-east of the Handelmort Mansion.
image: Cryptic clue - search crates guard house east ardougne.png

clue: Search the crates in the most north-western house in Al Kharid.
note: The house southeast of the gnome glider and the gem stall.
image: Cryptic clue - search crates north-west house al kharid.png

clue: Search the crates in the outhouse of the long building in Taverley.
note: Located in the small building attached by a fence to the main building. Climb over the stile.
image: Cryptic clue - search crate outhouse taverley.png

clue: Search the crates in the Port Sarim Fishing shop.
note: Search the crates, by the door, in Gerrant's Fishy Business in Port Sarim.
image: Cryptic clue - search crates port sarim fishing.png

clue: Search the crate in Rommiks crafting shop in Rimmington.
note: The crates in Rommik's Crafty Supplies in Rimmington.
image: Cryptic clue - search crates Rommiks shop.png

clue: Search the crates in the shed just north of East Ardougne.
note: The crates in the shed north of the northern Ardougne bank.
image: Cryptic clue - search crates east ardougne shed.png

clue: Search the crates near a cart in Varrock.
note: South-east of Varrock Palace, south of the tree farming patch.
image: Cryptic clue - crate near varrock cart .png

clue: Search the single crate in Horvik's smithy in Varrock.
note: Horvik's Smithy is found north-east of Varrock Square.

clue: Search the drawers above Varrock's shops.
note: Located upstairs in Thessalia's Fine Clothes shop in Varrock.
image: Cryptic clue - search drawers varrock shops.png

clue: Search the drawers found upstairs in East Ardougne's houses.
note: Upstairs of the pub north of the Ardougne Castle.
image: Cryptic clue - search drawers east ardougne.png

clue: Search the drawers in a house in Draynor Village.
note: The drawer is located in the northernmost house in Draynor Village.

clue: Search the drawers in Catherby's Archery shop.
note: Hickton's Archery Emporium in Catherby.
image: Cryptic clue - search drawers catherby archery.png

clue: Search the drawers in Falador's chain mail shop.
note: Wayne's Chains - Chainmail Specialist store at the southern Falador walls.
image: Cryptic clue - search drawers falador chain mail shop.png

clue: Search the drawers in one of Gertrude's bedrooms.
note: Kanel's bedroom (south-eastern room), outside of west Varrock.

clue: Search the drawers in the ground floor of a shop in Yanille.
note: Search the drawers in Yanille's hunting shop.
image: Cryptic clue - search drawers yanille hunting shop.png

clue: Search the drawers in the house next to the Port Sarim mage shop.
note: House east of Betty's. Contains a cooking sink.
image: Cryptic clue - search drawers port sarim house.png

clue: Search the drawers in the upstairs of a house in Catherby.
note: Perdu's house in Catherby.
image: Cryptic clue - search drawers upstairs catherby.png

clue: Search the drawers of houses in Burthorpe.
note: Inside Hild's house in the north-east corner of Burthorpe.

clue: Search the drawers on the ground floor of a building facing Ardougne's Market.
note: Inside Noella's house north of the market.
image: Cryptic clue - search drawers house ardougne market.png

clue: Search the drawers upstairs in Falador's shield shop.
note: The 2nd floor of Cassie's Shield Shop near Falador's north gates.
image: Cryptic clue - search drawers falador shield shop.png

clue: Search the drawers upstairs in the bank to the East of Varrock.
note: East Varrock bank.
image: Cryptic clue - search drawers upstairs bank east varrock.png

clue: Search the drawers downstairs of houses in the eastern part of Falador.
note: House is located east of the eastern Falador bank and south of the fountain. The house is indicated by the [[File:Cooking range icon.png]] icon on the minimap.
image: Cryptic clue - search drawers falador houses.png

clue: Search the open crate found in the Hosidius kitchens.
note: The Hosidius Kitchen is east of the mess in Hosidius.
image: Cryptic clue - search crates in hosidius kitchen.png

clue: Search the tents in the Imperial Guard camp in Burthorpe for some boxes.
note: Search in the tents in north-west corner of the camp.

clue: Search the wheelbarrow in Rimmington mine.
note: The Rimmington mining site is located north of Rimmington.
image: Cryptic clue - search wheelbarrow rimmington mine.png

clue: Search through chests found in the upstairs of houses in eastern Falador.
note: The house is located south-west of the Falador Party Room. There are two chests in the room; search the northern chest.
image: Cryptic clue - search chests falador upstairs.png

clue: Search through some drawers in the upstairs of a house in Rimmington.
note: On the of the house north of Hetty the Witch's house in Rimmington.

clue: Search through some drawers found in Taverley's houses.
note: The south-eastern most house, south of Jatix's Herblore Shop.

clue: Search upstairs in the houses of Seers' Village for some drawers.
note: Located in the house with the spinning wheel. South of the Seers' Village bank.
image: Cryptic clue - search drawers seers village.png

clue: Someone watching the fights in the Emir's Arena is your next destination.
note: Talk to Jeed, found on the upper floors, at the Emir's Arena.
image: Cryptic clue - talk jeed duel arena.png

clue: Speak to Arhein in Catherby.
note: Arhein is just south of the Catherby bank.

clue: Speak to Doric, who lives north of Falador.
note: Doric is found north of Falador and east of the Taverley gate.

clue: Speak to Ellis in Al Kharid.
note: Ellis is the tanner just north of the Al Kharid bank.
image: Cryptic clue - talk ellis al kharid.png

clue: Speak to Gaius in Taverley.
note: Gaius is found in his shop in the north-west corner in Taverley, just south of Taverley's house portal.

clue: Speak to Hans to solve the clue.
note: Hans can be found at Lumbridge Castle.

clue: Speak to Jatix in Taverley.
note: Jatix is found in the middle of Taverley.

clue: Speak to Ned in Draynor Village.
note: Ned is found north or the Draynor bank.

clue: Speak to Rusty north of Falador.
note: Rusty can be found north-east of Falador on the way to the Mind Altar.

clue: Speak to Sarah at Falador farm.
note: Talk to Sarah at Falador farm, north of Port Sarim.
image: Cryptic clue - speak sarah falador farm.png

clue: Speak to Sir Kay in Camelot Castle.
note: Sir Kay can be found in the courtyard at Camelot Castle.
image: Cryptic clue - speak sir kay camelot.png

clue: Speak to the bartender of the Blue Moon Inn in Varrock.
note: Talk to the bartender in Blue Moon Inn in Varrock.
image: Cryptic clue - speak bartender blue moon inn varrock.png

clue: Speak to the Lady of the Lake.
note: Talk to the Lady of the Lake in Taverley.
image: Cryptic clue - speak lady of the lake.png

clue: Speak to the staff of Sinclair mansion.
note: Speak to Louisa, on the, found at the Sinclair Mansion.
image: Cryptic clue - speak louisa sinclair mansion.png

clue: Strength potions with red spiders' eggs? He is quite a herbalist.
note: Talk to Apothecary in South-western Varrock. (The) Apothecary is just north-west of the Varrock Swordshop.

clue: Surrounded by white walls and gems.
note: Talk to Herquin, the gem store owner in Falador.

clue: Talk to Ali the Leaflet Dropper north of the Al Kharid mine.
note: Ali the Leaflet Dropper can be found roaming north of the Al Kharid mine.
image: Cryptic clue - talk ali the leaflet dropper.png

clue: Talk to Ambassador Spanfipple in the White Knights Castle.
note: Ambassador Spanfipple can be found roaming on the of the White Knights' Castle.

clue: Talk to a party-goer in Falador.
note: Lucy is the bartender on the of the Party Room.

clue: Talk to Cassie in Falador.
note: Cassie is found just south-east of the northern Falador gate.

clue: Talk to Charles at Port Piscarilius.
note: Charles is found by Veos' ship in Port Piscarilius.

clue: Talk to the cook in the Blue Moon Inn in Varrock.
note: The Blue Moon Inn can be found by the southern entrance to Varrock.
image: Cryptic clue - talk to blue moon cook.png

clue: Talk to Ermin.
note: Ermin can be found on the of the tree house south-east of the Gnome Agility Course.

clue: Talk to the barber in the Falador barber shop.
note: The Hairdresser can be found in the barber shop, north of the west Falador bank.
image: Cryptic clue - talk hairdresser falador barber shop.png

clue: Talk to the bartender of the Rusty Anchor in Port Sarim.
note: The Bartender can be found in the Rusty Anchor Inn, which is located in the northern part of Port Sarim.
image: Cryptic clue - talk bartender rusty anchor.png

clue: Talk to the Doomsayer.
note: The Doomsayer can be found just north of Lumbridge Castle entrance.

clue: Talk to Morgan in his house at Draynor Village.
note: Morgan can be found in the house with the map icon.

clue: Talk to the mother of a basement dwelling son.
note: Evil Dave's mother, Doris, is located in the house west of Edgeville bank.

clue: Talk to the Squire in the White Knights' castle in Falador.
note: The Squire is located in the courtyard of the White Knights' Castle.

clue: Talk to Turael in Burthorpe.
note: Turael is located in the small house east of The Toad and Chicken inn.

clue: Talk to Wayne at Wayne's Chains in Falador.
note: Wayne's shop is found directly south of the White Knights' Castle.

clue: Talk to Zeke in Al Kharid.
note: Zeke is the owner of the scimitar shop in Al Kharid.
image: Cryptic clue - talk zeke al kharid.png

clue: Thanks, Grandma!
note: Tynan can be found in the north-east corner of Port Piscarilius.

clue: The hand ain't listening.
note: Talk to The Face located by the manhole just north of the Port Sarim fishing shop.
image: Cryptic clue - talk to the face.png

clue: A demon's best friend holds the next step of this clue.
note:
Kill a hellhound.
Note: Killing Cerberus will count, but hellhounds inside the God Wars Dungeon will not count.

clue: A Guthixian ring lies between two peaks. Search the stones and you'll find what you seek.
note: Search the stones several steps west of the Guthixian stone circle in Taverley, search the stones.

clue: A reck you say; let's pray there aren't any ghosts.
note: Speak to Father Aereck in Lumbridge.

clue: A ring of water surrounds 4 powerful rings, dig above the ladder located there.
note: Dig by the ladder leading to the Dagannoth Kings' room in the Waterbirth Island Dungeon.

clue: Desert insects is what I see. Taking care of them was my responsibility. Your solution is found by digging near me.
note: Dig next to the entomologist, in the Kalphite Cave east of Shantay Pass.

clue: Dig under Razorlor's toad batta.
note:
Dig on the toad batta spawn in Tarn's Lair. See this map for directions. From the entrance, follow the route C-K, or, alternatively, D-S-Q-P-O-N-M-L.
Or faster: from the Slayer ring teleport, east, jump west past mages, get pushed by wall crushers, south, south, west, west, south, search the tile (floor) to deactivate the log trap and jump over, south, south, "go down", but you'll fall right where the toad batta is.

clue: Dig where the forces of Zamorak and Saradomin collide.
note: Dig next to the law rift in the Abyss, in the north-east section.
image: Cryptic clue - Dig Abyss law rift.png

clue: Dobson is my last name, and with gardening I seek fame.
note: Horacio, located in the garden of the Handelmort Mansion in East Ardougne.

clue: Does one really need a fire to stay warm here?
note: Located next to the fire near the Volcanic Mine entrance on the Fossil Island Volcano.
image: Cryptic clue - a fire to stay warm.png

clue: Even the seers say this clue goes right over their heads.
note: Search the crate on the Seers' Village Rooftop Course. Requires 60 Agility (can be boosted from 55 with a Summer pie).

clue: Ghostly bones.
note: Kill an Ankou, which can be found on the 4th level of Stronghold of Security, the Stronghold Slayer Cave, the Catacombs of Kourend, and The Forgotten Cemetery.

clue: Green is the colour of my death as the winter-guise, I swoop towards the ground.
note:
Required:, partial completion of Troll Romance.
Players need to slide down to where Trollweiss grows on Trollweiss Mountain.

clue: Has no one told you it is rude to ask a lady her age?
note: Speak to Mawrth in Lletya

clue: His bark is worse than his bite.
note: Speak to Barker at Canifis's Barkers' Haberdashery.

clue: I am the one who watches the giants. The giants in turn watch me. I watch with two while they watch with one. Come seek where I may be.
note: Speak to Kamfreena on the top floor of the Warriors' Guild.

clue: I burn between heroes and legends.
note: Speak to the candle maker in Catherby.
image: Cryptic clue - speak to candle maker.png

clue: I live in a deserted crack collecting soles.
note: Enter the crack west of Nardah rug merchant, and talk to the genie. A rope and a lightsource are required (partial completion of Spirits of the Elid required).

clue: In a while...
note: Kill a crocodile.

clue: Let's hope you don't meet a watery death when you encounter this fiend.
note: Kill a waterfiend.

clue: Mix yellow with blue and add heat, make sure you bring protection.
note: Kill a green dragon or brutal green dragon. Players who have completed Dragon Slayer II can use the Myths' Guild basement to kill green dragons outside the Wilderness.

clue: More resources than I can handle, but in a very dangerous area. Can't wait to strike gold!
note: Dig in the centre of the three gold rocks in the Resource Area deep in the Wilderness. An entry fee of 7,500 coins is required (6,000 if the medium Wilderness Diary is completed, 3,750 if the hard diary is completed, or free if the elite diary is completed).

clue: Observing someone in a swamp, under the telescope lies treasure.
note: Dig by the telescope in the island where Broken Handz can be found (fairy ring code ).
image: Cryptic clue - dig poison waste telescope.png

clue: Reflection is the weakness for these eyes of evil.
note: Kill a basilisk, which requires a mirror shield and 40 Slayer. Basilisk knights also count, requiring 60 Slayer and completion of The Fremennik Exiles.

clue: Right on the blessed border, cursed by the evil ones. On the spot inaccessible by both; I will be waiting. The bugs' imminent possession holds the answer.
note: Dig right under the fairy ring located west of Filliman's grotto. The fairy ring code is . Players without access to fairy ring transport can use the shortcut to get to the island provided they have 50 Agility.

clue: Scattered coins and gems fill the floor. The chest you seek is in the north east.
note: Kill the King Black Dragon for a key (elite), and then open the closed chest in the north-east corner of the lair.
image: Cryptic clue - coins and gems fill the floor.png

clue: 'See you in your dreams' said the vegetable man.
note: Speak to Dominic Onion at the Nightmare Zone teleport spot.

clue: Show this to Sherlock.
note: Sherlock can be found south of Seers' Village. Players will have to perform one of the Sherlock tasks in order to complete this challenge.

clue: Speak to a Wyse man.
note: Talk to Wyson the gardener at Falador Park.
image: Cryptic clue - talk to wyse man.png

clue: Surround my bones in fire, on top the wooden pyre. Finally lay me to rest, before my one last test.
note: Kill a confused barbarian or lost barbarian within the Ancient Cavern to receive mangled bones. Construct a pyre ship and burn the bones onto the pyre with logs, a tinderbox, and an axe. Kill the ferocious barbarian spirit that spawns to receive the next clue.

clue: The beasts retreat, for their Queen is gone; the song of this town still plays on. Dig near the birthplace of a blade, be careful not to melt your spade.
note: (Requires full completion of the Swan Song quest. There is no need to accept the reward though!) Dig in front of the small furnace in the Piscatoris Fishing Colony.

clue: Three rule below and three sit at top. Come dig at my entrance.
note: Dig in front of the entrance to the Waterbirth Island Dungeon.

clue: Varrock is where I reside, not the land of the dead, but I am so old, I should be there instead. Let's hope your reward is as good as it says, just 1 gold one and you can have it read.
note: Talk to Aris, west of Varrock Square.
image: Cryptic clue - speak to Gypsy Aris.png

clue: With a name like that, you'd expect a little more than just a few scimitars.
note: Speak to Daga on Ape Atoll. Note: If Monkey Madness II has not been completed, you must be wielding any Monkey Greegree to speak to Daga.

clue: W marks the spot.
note: Dig in the middle of the Warriors' Guild entrance hall. To enter, a player must have their Attack and Strength levels add up to a total of 130 or have either one equal to 99.
image: Cryptic clue - w marks the spot.png

clue: With drinks and dwarves I make my way, upon my head a glass will stay.
note: Speak to Funbo in The Lost Pickaxe pub in Cam Torum.

clue: You'll get licked.
note: Kill a bloodveld. Mutated variants do work. Bloodvelds in the God Wars Dungeon do work.

clue: You'll have to plug your nose if you use this source of herbs.
note: Kill an aberrant spectre or deviant spectre and pick up the clue or casket that it drops.

clue: You might have to turn over a few stones to progress.
note: Kill a rock crab and pick up the casket or clue that it drops.
image: Cryptic clue - kill a rock crab.png

clue: You must be 100 to play with me.
note: Speak to the Veteran boat squire at Pest Control.
image: Cryptic clue - speak squire pest control.png

clue: You were 3 and I was the 6th. Come speak to me.
note: Speak to Vannaka in Edgeville Dungeon.

clue: You will have to fly high where a sword cannot help you.
note: Kill an aviansie.

clue: 46 is my number. My body is the colour of burnt orange and crawls among those with eight. Three mouths I have, yet I cannot eat. My blinking blue eye hides my grave.
note: Dig on top of the sapphire spawn in the Spiders' nest in level 46 Wilderness (north-west of Lava Dragon Isle).
image: Cryptic clue - dig spider nest wilderness.png

clue: 'A bag belt only?', he asked his balding brothers.
note: Talk to Abbot Langley in the monastery near Edgeville.

clue: Aggie I see, Lonely and southern I feel I am neither inside nor outside the house yet no house would be complete without me. The treasure lies beneath me!
note: Dig outside the window of Aggie the Witch's house in Draynor Village.

clue: AIQ 0440
note: Dig 4 steps east and 4 steps south of the centre of the fairy ring (Mudskipper Point).

clue: AIR 2331
note: Dig 2 steps east and 1 step south of the centre of the fairy ring.

clue: AJP 3015
note: Dig 2 steps north and 5 steps west of the centre of the fairy ring.

clue: ALP 1140
note: Dig 1 step east and 3 steps south of the centre of the fairy ring near the Lighthouse.

clue:
And so on, and so on, and so on.
Walking from the land of many unimportant things leads to a choice of paths.
note: Dig on Etceteria next to the evergreen tree in front of the castle walls.

clue: The Big High War God left his mark on this place.
note: Dig anywhere in Yu'biusk (fairy ring after completion of Land of the Goblins).

clue: BIP 7013
note: Dig 6 steps north and 3 steps west of the centre of the fairy ring (Fairytale II - Cure a Queen or 50 Agility required).

clue: BJR 1123
note: Dig 1 steps south and 2 steps west of the centre of the fairy ring . Partial completion of the Holy Grail quest is required to enter this area.

clue: BLP 6200
note: Dig 6 steps north and 2 steps east of the centre of the fairy ring.

clue: CIS 0009
note: Dig 9 steps west of the centre of the fairy ring (code ) found north of the Arceuus Library. Alternatively, teleport to Arceuus and run north, or use a games necklace to teleport to the Wintertodt camp and run south.

clue: Citric cellar.
note: Speak to Heckel Funch on the in the Grand Tree.

clue: CKP 0224
note: Dig 2 steps south and 2 steps west of the centre of the fairy ring.

clue: Come have a cip with this great soot covered denizen.
note:
Talk to Miner Magnus east of the fairy ring (code ).
Answer: 8
image: Cryptic clue - talk to Miner Magnus.png

clue: Come to the, . Try not to get stung.
note: Dig in Edgeville, just east of the southern yew tree.
image: Cryptic clue - come to the evil ledge.png

clue: Covered in shadows, the centre of the circle is where you will find the answer.
note: Dig in the centre of Mort'ton, where the roads intersect. Just south of Razmire Keelgan.
image: Cryptic clue - dig centre circle mort'ton.png

clue: Dig in the lair of red wings, within the temple of the Sun and moon.
note: Dig in the red dragons room of Forthos dungeon.

clue: Dig where 4 siblings and I all live with our evil overlord.
note: Dig in the chicken pen inside the Champions' Guild. Requires 32 quest points to enter.
image: Cryptic clue - dig chicken pen in champion's guild.png

clue: DIP 8511
note: Dig 7 steps north and 4 steps east of the centre of the fairy ring (Abyssal Nexus).

clue: DKS 2310
note: Dig 1 step north and 3 steps east of the centre of the fairy ring (north-east of Rellekka).

clue: Four blades I have, yet draw no blood; Still I turn my prey to powder. If you are brave, come search my roof; It is there my blades are louder.
note: Lumbridge windmill, search the crates on the top floor.
image: Cryptic clue - search crate Lumbridge windmill.png

clue: A general who sets a 'shining' example.
note: Speak to General Hining found at Tyras Camp.
image: Cryptic clue - speak to General Hining.png

clue: Generally speaking, his nose was very bent.
note: Talk to General Bentnoze, found in the northernmost part of Goblin Village; he'll give you a puzzle box.

clue: Gold I see, yet gold I require. Give me 875 if death you desire.
note: Speak to Saniboch at the Brimhaven Dungeon entrance.

clue: A great view - watch the rapidly drying hides get splashed. Check the box you are sitting on.
note: Almera's house north of Baxtorian Falls, search the boxes on the.

clue: He knows just how easy it is to lose track of time.
note: Speak to Brother Kojo in the Clock Tower. Answer: 22.
image: Cryptic clue - talk to Brother Kojo.png

clue: His head might be hollow, but the crates nearby are filled with surprises.
note: Search the crates near the Clay golem in the ruins of Uzer.

clue:
I'd like to hear some music. Come and see me on the bridge in Falador Park, and play:  

Thanks, Cecilia
note: Speak to Cecilia, who is located on the bridge in Falador Park.

clue:
I am a token of the greatest love. I have no beginning or end. My eye is red, I can fit like a glove. Go to the place where it's money they lend,
And dig by the gate to be my friend.
note: Dig by the gate in the basement of the West Varrock bank.
image: Cryptic clue - dig west varrock bank basement.png

clue:
Identify the back of this over-acting brother.
(He's a long way from home.)
note: Talk to Hamid, the monk at the altar in the Emir's Arena hospital. You will receive a puzzle box.

clue: If a man carried my burden, he would break his back. I am not rich, but leave silver in my track. Speak to the keeper of my trail.
note: Speak to Gerrant in the fish shop in Port Sarim.

clue: If you look closely enough, it seems that the archers have lost more than their needles.
note: Search the haystack by the south corner of the Rangers' Guild. You need level 40 Ranged to access it.
image: Cryptic clue - search haystack ranging guild.png

clue: I have many arms but legs, I have just one. I have little family but my seed you can grow on, I am not dead, yet I am but a spirit, and my power, on your quests, you will earn the right to free it.
note:
Spirit tree in Tree Gnome Village.
Answer: 13112221
image: Cryptic clue - talk to spirit tree.png

clue:
I lie lonely and forgotten in mid wilderness, where the dead rise from their beds.
Feel free to quarrel and wind me up and dig while you shoot their heads.
note: Directly under the crossbow respawn in the Graveyard of Shadows in level 18 Wilderness.

clue: In the city where merchants are said to have lived, talk to a man with a splendid cape, but a hat dropped by goblins.
note: Talk to the head chef in Cooks' Guild west of Varrock. Remember to wear a Chef's Hat or Varrock armour 3 and above.

clue: It seems to have reached the end of the line, and it's still empty.
note: Search the carts in the northern part of the Dwarven Mine.
image: Cryptic clue - search cart dwarven mine.png

clue: I watch the sea. I watch you fish. I watch your tree.
note: Speak to Ellena at Catherby fruit tree patch.

clue: Leader of the Yak City.
note: Talk to Mawnis Burowgar in Neitiznot. Fremennik Isles jester part or a silly jester costume is required.

clue: Mine was the strangest birth under the sun. I left the crimson sack, yet life had not begun. Entered the world, and yet was seen by none.
note: Inside Karamja Volcano, dig directly underneath the red spiders' eggs respawn.

clue: Must be full of railings.
note: Search the boxes around the hut where the broken dwarf cannon is, close to the start of the Dwarf Cannon quest (north-west of the Fishing Guild).
image: Cryptic clue - search boxes south Coal Trucks.png

clue: My giant guardians below the market streets would be fans of rock and roll, if only they could grab hold of it. Dig near my green bubbles!
note:
Dig near the cauldron by moss giants under Varrock Sewers. A slash weapon or knife is required to navigate through the sewers.

Players with 51 Agility can use the shortcut pipe from Edgeville Dungeon to direct access the clue location; a slash weapon or knife is not required in this case.

clue: My home is grey, and made of stone; A castle with a search for a meal. Hidden in some drawers I am, across from a wooden wheel.
note: Open the drawers inside the room with the spinning wheel on the of Lumbridge Castle.
image: Cryptic clue - search drawers lumbridge castle.png

clue:
My name is like a tree, yet it is spelt with a 'g'.
Come see the fur which is right near me.
note: Speak to Wilough, next to the fur merchant in Varrock Square.

clue: Often sought out by scholars of histories past, find me where words of wisdom speak volumes.
note: Speak to an examiner at the Exam Centre. You might need to talk to several different examiners.

clue: Probably filled with books on magic.
note: Search the bookcase in the basement of Wizards' Tower.
image: Cryptic clue - search bookcase wizard tower.png

clue: Read 'How to breed scorpions.' By O.W.Thathurt.
note: Search the northern bookcase on the of the Sorcerer's Tower.
image: Cryptic clue - search bookcase sorcerer tower.png

clue: Rotting next to a ditch. Dig next to the fish.
note: Dig next to a fishing spot on the south-east side of Burgh de Rott.
image: Cryptic clue - Dig next to the fish.png

clue:
'Small shoe.'
Often found with rod on mushroom.
note: Talk to any Gnome trainer in the Agility area of the Tree Gnome Stronghold.

clue: Snah? I feel all confused, like one of those cakes...
note: Talk to Hans roaming around Lumbridge Castle.

clue: Surprising? I bet he is...
note: Talk to Sir Prysin in Varrock Palace.

clue: Surviving.
note: Talk to Sir Vyvin on the of Falador Castle (east side).

clue: The beasts to my east snap claws and tails, The rest to my west can slide and eat fish. The force to my north will jump and they'll wail, Come dig by my fire and make a wish.
note: Dig by the torch in the Ardougne Zoo, between the penguins and the scorpions.

clue: The cheapest water for miles around, but they react badly to religious icons.
note: Search the crates in the General Store tent in the Bandit Camp, south of the Bedabin Camp.
image: Cryptic clue - search crate bandit camp.png

clue: The effects of this fire are magnified.
note: Dig by the fire beside Ket'sal K'uk in the westernmost part of the Kebos Swamp.

clue: The keeper of Melzars...Spare? Skeleton? Anar?
note: Speak to Oziach in Edgeville.

clue: The King's magic shouldn't be wasted by me.
note: Talk to the Guardian mummy inside the Pyramid Plunder minigame in Sophanem. Partial completion of Icthlarin's Little Helper is required. The mummy will only be found in one of the four entrances, this might require players to check the other entrances.
image: Cryptic clue - talk to guardian mummy.png

clue: The magic of 4 colours, an early experience you could learn. The large beast caged up top, rages, as his demised kin's loot now returns.
note: Speak to Wizard Mizgog at the top of the Wizards' Tower south of Draynor.
image: Cryptic clue - talk to wizard mizgog.png

clue: The mother of the reptilian sacrifice.
note: Talk to Zul-Cheray in a house near the sacrificial boat at Zul-Andra.

clue: THEY'RE EVERYWHERE!!!! But they were here first. Dig for treasure where the ground is rich with ore.
note: Dig at Barbarian Village, next to the Stronghold of Security.

clue: This aviator is at the peak of his profession.
note: Captain Bleemadge, the gnome glider pilot, is found at the top of White Wolf Mountain.

clue:
This village has a problem with cartloads of the undead.
Try checking the bookcase to find an answer.
note: Search the bookcase by the doorway of the building just south-east of the Shilo Village Gem Mine.

clue: When no weapons are at hand, then is the time to reflect. In Saradomin's name, redemption draws closer...
note: On Entrana, search the southern drawer in the house with the cooking range on the western side of the island.
image: Cryptic clue - when no weapons are at hand.png

clue: When you get tired of fighting, go deep, deep down until you need an antidote.
note: Go to Yanille Agility dungeon and fall into the place with the poison spiders, either by repeatedly walking across the balancing ledge (level 40 Agility required) or praying at the altar of Zamorak. Search the crate by the stairs leading up. Note: Falling by praying at the altar will result in 15 unavoidable damage. Falling from the ledge results in significantly less (around 3 or 4).
image: Cryptic clue - When you get tired of fighting.png

clue: Where the best are commemorated, and a celebratory cup, not just for beer.
note: Dig at the Clan Cup Trophy south-west of the Citharede Abbey.

clue:
You have all of the elements available to solve this clue.
Fortunately you do not have to go as far as to stand in a draft.
note:
Requirements: Started Elemental Workshop I
Search the crate, just west of the Air elementals, inside the Elemental Workshop. Note: A battered key is required to enter to workshop.
image: Cryptic clue - search crate elemental workshop.png

clue: You will need to under-cook to solve this one.
note: Search the crate in the Lumbridge basement.
image: Cryptic clue - search crate lumbridge basement.png

clue: Try not to let yourself be dazzled when you search these drawers.
note: Search the western drawers in Jimmy Dazzler's home near the East Ardougne Rat Pits.
image: Cryptic clue - try not to get Dazzled.png

clue: 2 musical birds. Dig in front of the spinning light.
note: Dig in front of the spinning light in Ping and Pong's room inside the Iceberg. A clockwork suit is required to enter the iceberg.
image: Cryptic clue - dig ping and pong's room.png

clue: A chisel and hammer reside in his home, strange for one of magic. Impress him with your magical equipment.
note: Wizard Cromperty at the north-east corner of East Ardougne. Speak to him while wearing equipment adding up to at least +100 in magical attack bonus. The passive magic attack multiplication effect of Tumeken's shadow does not count towards the +100 requirement, but its base magic attack bonus of +35 will.
image: Cryptic clue - speak to wizard cromperty.png

clue: A dwarf, approaching death, but very much in the light.
note: Thorgel at the entrance to the Death Altar. Requires partial completion of Mourning's End Part II.
image: Cryptic clue - a dwarf approaching death.png

clue: A massive battle rages beneath so be careful when you dig by the large broken crossbow.
note: North-east of the God Wars Dungeon entrance, climb the rocky handholds and dig by the large crossbow.
image: Cryptic clue - dig by the large broken crossbow.png

clue: Anger Abbot Langley.
note: Speak to Abbot Langley while you have a negative prayer bonus (currently only possible with an Ancient staff, an Ancient sceptre, or Ruinous Powers book in Trailblazer Reloaded League).

clue: Anger those who adhere to Saradomin's edicts to prevent travel.
note: Port Sarim docks, try to charter a ship to Entrana with armour or weapons equipped.
image: Cryptic clue - entrana monks port sarim.png

clue:
Buried beneath the ground, who knows where it's found.

Lucky for you, A man called Jorral may have a clue.
note:
Speak to Jorral to receive a strange device, which works similarly to the enchanted key (must have Making History quest completed).

For a list of all possible locations, see here.

clue: Come brave adventurer, your sense is on fire. If you talk to me, it's an old god you desire.
note:
Speak to Viggora. Note that he can be found (is visible) in 3 locations, but you can only speak to (and continue the clue) the version of him that you spoke to during Curse of the Empty Lord miniquest. You can check your quest log to find out which location. 
*Paddewwa, Edgeville Dungeon, near the earth warriors.
* of the Rogues' Castle in the deep Wilderness.
* of the Canifis Slayer Tower, just before the Infernal Mage.

A ring of visibility or a ring of shadows and ghostspeak amulet are required to make progress through the clue.

clue: Darkness wanders around me, but fills my mind with knowledge.
note: Speak to Biblia on the Arceuus Library's top floor.

clue: Dig in front of the icy arena where 1 of 4 was fought.
note: Where you fought Kamil from Desert Treasure I, dig north-east of the first small rock just past the wolves.

clue: Faint sounds of 'Arr', fire giants found deep, the eastern tip of a lake, are the rewards you could reap.
note: Dig south of the pillar at the end of the Deep Wilderness Dungeon.
image: Cryptic clue - dig deep wilderness dungeon end.png

clue: Falo the bard wants to see you.
note: Speak to Falo the Bard, who is located on the road to the Fremennik Province.

clue: Elvish onions.
note: Dig in the onion patch east of the allotment patches in the east part of Prifddinas. Requires completion of Song of the Elves.

clue: Fiendish cooks probably won't dig the dirty dishes.
note: Dig by the fire in the Rogues' Den.
image: Cryptic clue - dig rogues' den fire.png

clue: The doorman of the Warriors' Guild wishes to be impressed by how strong your equipment is.
note: Speak to Ghommal (or Laidee Gnonock after While Guthix Sleeps) with a total Melee Strength bonus of 100 or more. (Note: Amulet of strength gives +10, even better than a fury for this clue. A dragon battleaxe gives +85 and is relatively easy to obtain for earlier-game players. A Godsword or Barrelchest anchor on its own is over 100 Strength bonus.)
image: Cryptic clue - talk ghommal warrior's guild.png

clue: Great demons, dragons, and spiders protect this blue rock, beneath which, you may find what you seek.
note: Dig by the runite rock in the Lava Maze Dungeon.
image: Cryptic clue - dig lava maze dungeon.png

clue: Guthix left his mark in a fiery lake, dig at the tip of it.
note: Dig at the tip of the lava lake that is shaped like a Guthixian symbol, west of the Mage Arena.
image: Cryptic clue - dig guthix lava lake.png

clue: Here, there are tears, but nobody is crying. Speak to the guardian and show off your alignment to balance.
note: Talk to Juna while wearing three Guthix-affiliated items. All Void Knight equipment is Guthix-affiliated.

clue: Hopefully this set of armour will help you to keep surviving.
note: Speak to Sir Vyvin while wearing white platebody and white platelegs/white plateskirt (white full helm is not needed).
image: Cryptic clue - speak to Sir Vyvin.png

clue: If you're feeling brave, dig beneath the dragon's eye.
note:
Dig below the mossy rock under the Viyeldi caves. Requires progress or completion of Legends' Quest. Items needed: Pickaxe, woodcutting axe, machete, unpowered orb, lockpick (multiple recommended), a spade, and any Charge Orb spell. A bravery potion and rope are also required if the quest is not completed (You also need any Axe and a Machete to get through the jungle).

Players with level 91 Agility can attach a long rope, purchased from the Darkmeyer General Store, to the rock next to the blue hat to instantly climb down the large cliff.

clue: I lie beneath the first descent to the holy encampment.
note: Dig immediately after climbing down the first set of rocks towards Saradomin's Encampment within the God Wars Dungeon. Two ropes are needed; one to enter the dungeon and another to enter Saradomin's Encampment (not required if you've used once before already). 70 Agility is also required (cannot be boosted).

clue: My life was spared but these voices remain, now guarding these iron gates is my bane.
note: Speak to the Key Master in Cerberus' Lair.
image: Cryptic clue - talk to key master.png

clue: One of several rhyming brothers, in business attire with an obsession for paper work.
note: Speak to Piles in the Resource Area. An entry fee of 7,500 coins is required (6,000 if the medium Wilderness Diary is completed, 3,750 if the hard diary is completed, or free if the elite diary is completed).

clue: Pentagrams and demons, burnt bones and remains, I wonder what the blood contains.
note: Dig under the blood rune spawn next to the Demonic Ruins.
image: Cryptic clue - dig blood rune spawn.png

clue: Robin wishes to see your finest ranged equipment.
note: Robin at the inn in Port Phasmatys. Speak to him while wearing equipment adding up to 181 ranged attack bonus or over ( crystal bow gives +100 ranged attack bonus on its own). The bonuses from a toxic blowpipe does not count.

clue: She's small but can build both literally and figuratively.
note: Speak to Lovada south of the Lovakengj blast mine.

clue: Shhhh!
note: Speak to Logosia in the Arceuus Library's ground floor.

clue: Show this to Sherlock.
note: Sherlock can be found south of Seers' Village. Players will have to perform one of the Sherlock tasks in order to complete this challenge.

clue: South of a river in a town surrounded by the undead, what lies beneath the furnace?
note: Dig in front of the Shilo Village furnace.

clue: The far north eastern corner where 1 of 4 was defeated, the shadows still linger.
note: Dig on the north-eastern-most corner of the Shadow Dungeon. Bring a ring of visibility or a ring of shadows.

clue: This place sure is a mess.
note: Ewesey is located in the Hosidius mess hall.

clue: Under a giant robotic bird that cannot fly.
note: Dig next to the terrorbird display in the south exhibit of Varrock Museum's basement.
image: Cryptic clue - under a giant robotic bird.png

clue: Where safe to speak, the man who offers the pouch of smallest size wishes to see your alignment.
note: Speak to the Mage of Zamorak in the Zamorakian chapel south of Aubury's Rune Shop in East Varrock while wearing three items aligned to Zamorak.
image: Cryptic clue - speak to Mage of Zamorak.png

clue: A graceful man of many colours, his crates must be full of many delights.
note: Kill a hill giant to obtain the key. Search the crate on the of Osten's shop in Shayzien.

clue:
[[Clue scroll (medium) - A town with a different sort of night-life is your destination|A town with a different sort of night-life is your destination.
Search for some crates in one of the houses.]]
note: Search the crate inside of the clothes shop in Canifis. (fairy ring code )
image: Cryptic clue - search crate barkers canifis.png

clue: Are you somewhat entertained?
note: Speak to Gloria inside the Fortis Colosseum.
image: Cryptic clue - are you somewhat entertained.png

clue: Find a crate close to the monks that like to paaarty!
note: The crate is in the east side of the Kandarin Monastery, which is south of Ardougne and where Brother Omad is found.
image: Cryptic clue - search crate yanille monastery.png

clue: Go to the village being attacked by trolls, search the drawers in one of the houses.
note: Go to Dunstan's house in the north-east corner of Burthorpe. Kill Penda in The Toad and Chicken to obtain the key.
image: Cryptic clue - search drawers dunstan burthrope.png

clue: Go to this building to be illuminated, and check the drawers while you are there.
note:
The of the Lighthouse (fairy ring code ).
Kill a Rellekka marketplace guard to obtain the key. (Note: Starting the Horror from the Deep quest and speaking to Gunnjorn to obtain the Lighthouse key is required! Level 35 Agility is required to talk to Gunnjorn. You must also repair the bridge with two wooden planks, a hammer and 60 steel nails.)

clue:
I'd like to hear some music. Come and see me on the bridge in Falador Park, and play:  

Thanks, Cecilia
note: Speak to Cecilia, who is located on the bridge in Falador Park.

clue: In a town where everyone has perfect vision, seek some locked drawers in a house that sits opposite a workshop.
note:
The drawers is in Seers' Village in the house south of the Elemental Workshop entrance.
Kill any chicken to obtain a key. (Note: The closest chicken is just by the entrance of the Ranging Guild, west of Seers' Village.)
image: Cryptic clue - search drawer seers village.png

clue: In a town where the guards are armed with maces, search the upstairs rooms of the Public House.
note:
Search the drawers in the pub north of Ardougne Castle.
Kill a guard dog at Handelmort Mansion to obtain the key.
image: Cryptic clue - search drawers east ardougne.png

clue: In a town where thieves steal from stalls, search for some drawers in the upstairs of a house near the bank.
note: Kill any guard located around East Ardougne for a medium key. Then, search the drawers in the upstairs hallway of Jerico's house, which is the house with pigeon cages located south of the northern East Ardougne bank.
image: Cryptic clue - search drawers jerico east ardougne.png

clue: In a town where wizards are known to gather, search upstairs in a large house to the north.
note: Travel to Yanille and head to the house north-west of the bank. Kill a man nearby to receive a key. Go upstairs in the house and search the chest.''

clue: In a village made of bamboo, look for some crates under one of the houses.
note: Search the crate by the house at the northern point of the broken jungle fence in Tai Bwo Wannai.
image: Cryptic clue - search crates tai bwo wannai.png

clue: Probably filled with wizards socks.
note: Kill one of the wizards for the key. Search the drawers in the basement of the Wizards' Tower south of Draynor Village. (Fairy Ring D-I-S)
image: Cryptic clue - search drawer wizard tower.png

clue: Search the basket of apples in an orchard, south of the unknown grave surrounded by white roses.
note: It's in the orchard north-west of Hosidius.

clue: Search the upstairs drawers of a house in a village where pirates are known to have a good time.
note:
The house in the south-east corner of Brimhaven, north-east of Davon's Amulet Store.
Kill any pirate located around Brimhaven to obtain the key.

clue: Speak to a referee.
note:
Talk to a Gnome ball referee found on the Gnome Ball field in the Gnome Stronghold. You will receive a challenge scroll that you have to answer.
Answer: 5096

clue: Speak to Donovan, the Family Handyman.
note: Donovan the Family Handyman is found on the of Sinclair Mansion.
image: Cryptic clue - speak donovan sinclair mansion.png

clue: Speak to Hajedy.
note: Hajedy is found by the cart, located just south of the Brimhaven docks.

clue: Speak to Hazelmere.
note: Hazelmere is located east of Yanille. The code will take you directly next to his house. Answer: 6859

clue: Speak to Kangai Mau.
note: Kangai Mau is found in the Shrimp and Parrot in Brimhaven.

clue: Speak to Roavar.
note: Talk to Roavar in the Canifis tavern.

clue: Speak to Ulizius.
note: Ulizius is the monk who guards the gate into Mort Myre Swamp. (fairy ring code )

clue: The dead, red dragon watches over this chest. He must really dig the view.
note:
Search the chest underneath the Red Dragon's head in the Exam Centre.
Kill a barbarian in Barbarian Village, Barbarian Outpost or the Blue Moon Inn to receive the key.
image: Cryptic clue - search chest exam centre.png

clue: This crate holds a better reward than a broken arrow.
note: Inside the Ranging Guild. Search the crate behind the northern most building.
image: Cryptic clue - search crate ranging guild.png

clue: This crate is mine, all mine, even if it is in the middle of the desert.
note: Centre of the Desert Mining Camp. Search the crates. Requires the metal key from The Tourist Trap to enter.
image: Cryptic clue - search crate desert mining camp.png

clue: Try not to step on any aquatic nasties while searching this crate.
note: Search the crate in Bailey's house on the Fishing Platform.
image: Cryptic clue - search crate fishing platform.png

clue: You'll need to look for a town with a central fountain. Look for a locked chest in the town's chapel.
note:
Search the chest by the stairs in the Varrock church, east of the palace.
Kill a monk in Ardougne Monastery to obtain the key.
image: Cryptic clue - search chest varrock church.png

clue: Dig in the centre of a great kingdom of 5 cities.
note: Dig in front of the large statue in the centre of Great Kourend.
image: Cryptic clue - dig centre Kourend statue.png

clue: I wouldn't wear this jean on my legs.
note: Talk to Father Jean in the Hosidius church.

clue: Monk's residence in the far west. See robe storage device.
note: Search the drawers in the south tent of the monk's camp found west of the Hosidius mine.
image: Cryptic clue - see robe storage device.png

clue: Salty peter.
note: Talk to Konoo who is digging saltpetre in Hosidius.

clue: Search the open crate found in the Hosidius kitchens.
note: The Hosidius Kitchen is east of the mess in Hosidius.
image: Cryptic clue - search crates in hosidius kitchen.png

clue: Talk to Charles in Port Piscarilius.
note: Charles is found by Veos' ship in Port Piscarilius.

clue: Thanks, Grandma!
note: Tynan can be found in the north-east corner of Port Piscarilius.

clue: CIS 0009
note: Dig 9 steps west of the centre of the fairy ring. Fairy Ring Code CIS (You can also use Skills necklace to teleport to the Woodcutting Guild and run north, or use games necklace to teleport to Wintertodt camp and walk south, or walk north from the minecarts.)

clue: The effects of this fire are magnified.
note: Dig by the fire beside Ket'sal K'uk in the westernmost part of the Kebos Swamp.

clue: A demon's best friend holds the next step of this clue.
note: Kill a hellhound, which can be found in the north-western section of the Catacombs of Kourend.

clue: Darkness wanders around me, but fills my mind with knowledge.
note: Speak to Biblia on the Arceuus Library's top floor.

clue: She's small but can build both literally and figuratively, as long as you have their favour
note: Speak to Lovada south of the Lovakengj blast mine.

clue: Shhhh!
note: Speak to Logosia in the Arceuus Library's ground floor.

clue: This place sure is a mess.
note: Ewesey is located in the Hosidius mess hall.
